text: Arau allahe yaka hatya karaibalai nisid'dha karaiche yathartha karanabihina tomaloke taka hatya nakaraiba! Arau konoba'i an'yayabharae nihita ha’le tara uttaraadhikaraika ami tara pratisodha loraara adhikara dicho; kintu hatya samparke si yena simalanghana nakarae; niscaya si sahayyapraapta ha’ba
